name: Failticity Next Level!
description:
FAILTICITY IS BACK IN IT'S LATEST VERSION : FAILTICITY : NEXT LEVEL!

This refined edition of Failticity features new levels and settings with better graphics unlike prior editions! Experience the game in a whole new way!

What is Failticity? : Failticity is a unique first person parkour simulator mean't to send you raging. In previous editions, levels were purposefully confusing and mixed up to trick and challenge you. Unlike previous editions, Next Level refines this mechanic to be more "noob friendly".

Current Features:

  • 8 Levels over 2 Worlds.
  • Timers to challenge your skill.
  • Multiple Directions to take!
  • Special Level at the end of each World!

Planned Features:

  • 32 Levels over 8 Worlds in the Base Game!
  • Extra Content through DLC and Free Updates!
  • Online & Local Multiplayer (Coop and Versus Races)!
  • Leaderboards

Credits:

Summusic - Game Music

Unity - Game Engine

Unity Community - Scripts / Scripting Help

Piskel - Icon and Misc. Art

Awesomnessticity - Original Concept / Inspiration

Speedrun Game Jam Community - Continuation Inspiration

- Entry for Speedrun Game Jam by Joshua McLean -

Theme : Direction

Game Jam Mechanic : Speedrun

Implementation : You can go different directions during Speedruns to get a better time.

- Entry for IGMC2018 -

Theme : Next Big Indie Game!

Game Jam Mechanic : Same as Theme.

Implementation : Improve / refine upon a previous game / game idea to make it as good as possible!
